ecopedia.section: How do i get in here?

Getting in the Hall of fame is easy! its just donations! Donate to the server/Elixr Mods and you will be in the Hall of Fame! Simple!
Also note, that amounts donated will not be added here, as it is not a competition, Names posted are also not done in a "Leadership" Way,
Your name will only appear on here once, and you will forever have our love!
